notes: Permit work may trigger hardwired, interconnected upgrades. Verify with your AHJ.

smoke.text: Install smoke alarms inside every bedroom.
Install smoke alarms outside each sleeping area.
Install at least one smoke alarm on every level, including basements.

co.text: Install at least one CO alarm on every level with a sleeping area.
Install a CO alarm near the door to an attached garage.

devices.text: Prefer photoelectric or dual-sensor smoke alarms in sleeping areas.
Use 10-year sealed battery alarms where hardwiring not required.

notes.text: Follow manufacturer spacing and installation instructions.
Interconnect alarms when possible; all alarms should sound together.

citations.text: NFPA 72 (National Fire Alarm and Signaling Code) guidance.
